text: Monster is a 2003 American crime drama movie. It is a true story about female American serial killer Aileen Wuornos. Wuornos is played by Charlize Theron. She received an Academy Award for her role. The movie also features Christina Ricci as Wuornos' girlfriend. The movie was directed by first time director Patty Jenkins. == Other websites == * Category:2003 crime drama movies Category:2003 LGBT movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:2000s American biographical movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:Antisocial personality disorder in fiction Category:Borderline personality disorder in fiction Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Female buddy movies Category:LGBT crime movies Category:LGBT drama movies Category:Movies set in Florida Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies set in the 1990s Category:American independent movies Category:Movies directed by Patty Jenkins
title: Monster (movie)
